attributes.action: let all serving and former gurkhas stay at mp's second homes for 50p per week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Today once again the labour party is in disgrace. This time its over the treatment of the gurkhas. It is my opinion that all MP's second homes should be used to home all former and currently serving gurkhas and their close family for 50p per week. Its good value as gurkhas have a witty banter !!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
